description:
Mountains. They proudly stand tall in the land and thwart man`s efforts.
Mountains. Mysterious places that continue to produce solemn silence.
Mountains. They challenge man to reach for the stars.
"Reaching the summit was not my goal"  -Why does man, why does Koizumi-san climb mountains-
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Montagne / Ramen butayarô / Ramen à la graisse de porc
山 / 豚野郎 / 背脂
